title: I Keep Disconnecting from my internet only when i play league of legends!?
body: I keep disconnecting from my internet only when i play league of legends!? I own a MacBook Air (2016 or 2015?) and I only disconnect when i play league and im in game? Can anyone help me with this? I just want to play a normal game of League but i have to dc about 10-20 times a game!? PLEASE HELP ME!? D:

replies.body:
The Mac client is particularly sensitive to network drops or packet loss. There are a number of potential causes for the issues you're seeing, but our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) addresses the most common solutions.

Let me know if you continue to have issues after working through that guide.

Hey Bro, Thanks for trying. I tried, all this and nothing has happened. The only time that i dc is when i play League. Idk why. so stressed because i always dc when im in lane and then i give a free kill. :/

Since you're still having issues, I'd like to refer you to our tech specialists, who can dive into some logs and find the core cause of these issues. 

Run a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#section-mac), then attach them with your request as you [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

If you have any questions, let me know.
